div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-sign-level-of-evidence defines the following codes:

tr.td: High-quality meta-analyses, systematic reviews of RCTs, or RCTs with a very low risk of bias.
Well-conducted meta-analyses, systematic reviews, or RCTs with a low risk of bias.
Meta-analyses, systematic reviews, or RCTs with a high risk of bias.

High-quality systematic reviews of case-control or cohort studies, or high-quality case-control or cohort studies with a very low risk of confounding or bias and a high probability that the relationship is causal.
Well-conducted case-control or cohort studies with a low risk of confounding or bias and a moderate probability that the relationship is causal.
Case-control or cohort studies with a high risk of confounding or bias and a significant risk that the relationship is not causal.
Non-analytic studies, e.g., case reports, case series.

description.value: CodeSystem representing the Scottish Intercollegiate Guidelines Network (SIGN) Levels of Evidence.

definition.value: High-quality meta-analyses, systematic reviews of RCTs, or RCTs with a very low risk of bias.

valueString.value: Hochwertige Metaanalysen, systematische Reviews von RCTs oder RCTs mit sehr niedrigem Bias-Risiko.

definition.value: Well-conducted meta-analyses, systematic reviews, or RCTs with a low risk of bias.

valueString.value: Gut durchgeführte Metaanalysen, systematische Reviews oder RCTs mit geringem Bias-Risiko.

definition.value: Meta-analyses, systematic reviews, or RCTs with a high risk of bias.

valueString.value: Metaanalysen, systematische Reviews oder RCTs mit hohem Bias-Risiko.

definition.value: High-quality systematic reviews of case-control or cohort studies, or high-quality case-control or cohort studies with a very low risk of confounding or bias and a high probability that the relationship is causal.

valueString.value: Hochwertige systematische Reviews von Fall-Kontroll- oder Kohortenstudien oder hochwertige Fall-Kontroll- oder Kohortenstudien mit sehr niedrigem Risiko für Confounding oder Bias.

definition.value: Well-conducted case-control or cohort studies with a low risk of confounding or bias and a moderate probability that the relationship is causal.

valueString.value: Gut durchgeführte Fall-Kontroll- oder Kohortenstudien (nicht-randomisierte Studien) mit niedrigem Risiko für Confounding oder Bias.

definition.value: Case-control or cohort studies with a high risk of confounding or bias and a significant risk that the relationship is not causal.

valueString.value: Fall-Kontroll- oder Kohortenstudien mit hohem Risiko für Confounding oder Bias.

definition.value: Non-analytic studies, e.g., case reports, case series.

valueString.value: Nicht-analytische Studien, z. B. Fallberichte, Fallserien.
